headline: House Committee on Oversight and Reform’s Inspection and Border Trip – Rep. Dr. Paul Gosar
sentences: I joined Ranking Member James Comer (R-KY), Representatives Yvette Herrell (R-N.M.), Glenn Grothman (R-WI), Pete Sessions (R-TX), and Byron Donalds (R-FL) and staff for the House Committee border trip.
We journeyed from San Diego, California, to Yuma, Arizona, to examine how President Biden has opened our borders and allowed over 2.5 million illegal aliens to prance into our country.
Earlier this week I joined the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on an inspection trip to our under-siege southern border, from California to Yuma.
I joined my colleagues to tour ports of entry, Customs and Border Patrol detention facilities, and President Trump’s American unfinished border wall.
We also spoke to local officials like Supervisor Jonathan Lines about the severe social problems resulting from Biden’s open borders policy.
These are all economic opportunists taking advantage of our good nature All paid drug cartels to get here.
In two days, we ran into foreign nationals from countries from Haiti, Uzbekistan, Guatemala and Portugal.
I commend Texas Governor Abbot for deporting illegal aliens out of Texas to Washington, D.C.
These lawbreakers bring drugs including fentanyl, which cause 105,000 deaths in 2021.
None of the illegal aliens are fleeing government persecution in their homeland.
There is nothing humane or decent about opening our borders.
No other nation in the world does this because it is insane.
They arrive clean, with new cell phones and are well fed.
They are part of an international trafficking conspiracy.
The magnitude of this disaster cannot be overstated.
They traffic children and women for prostitution.
They take jobs and keep wages low for Americans.
All illegal aliens need to be deported.
Our country is under attack.
Many are muling drugs.
None.
